sentences.english: I found myself in an entirely new world the moment I arrived in Beijing.

sentences.english: For a refreshing twist try making “Rosebud Ice Cubes.”

sentences.english: Concise and contemporary blue mosaic partition wall, your person finds everything new and fresh.

sentences.english: What is refreshing is the author's easy, conversational style.

sentences.english: His eyes and ears dulled by age.
sentences.chinese: 他的耳目因年老而變得不靈了。
